title: TIB AIssistant: a Platform for AI-Supported Research Across Research Life Cycles
summary: The rapidly growing popularity of adopting Artificial Intelligence (AI), and specifically Large Language Models (LLMs), is having a widespread impact throughout society, including the academic domain. AI-supported research has the potential to support researchers with tasks across the entire research life cycle.
